Text.val: Author: Juergen Paarmann
program handels the internal prolongation of crediot limit
selection of DEBTOR_CLIENT obtain with SQL-where-clause
24.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
22.03.2011 JOH SCR16306 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and
GB002 by GB902
05.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
10.11.2004 SH SCR7317 MQ (16) will be deleted with BMQ015 now
on 11.6.2004 WJ SCR6353 extended with sequence DEBC_INTERNALPROLONG/
DEBC_ADMNO/DEBC_CLNTNO
09.12.2003 SH SCR4986 Extended the test for prolongate auto. with
- (OR DEBC_REINSURANCETYPE = 1 and DEBC_REINSURANCELIM > 0)
05-11-2003 JP request JP: change first param in call GB002 from "D" to "H"
04-09-2003 SH SC4245 Extended the RANGE on DEBC with DEBC_OWNJUDGLIMIT = N
21-03-2003 JP request JDO: change locking behavior in task "Update DEBC" to
record prefix level.
DEBC_CREDITLIMIT (=v.CalcAmount) < AMOUNTAUTOPROLONG and DEBH_NEGATIVET='N'
New since 09.12.2003 SH SCR4986 --> OR (DEBC_REINSURANCETYPE = 1 (Heller)
- and DEBC_REINSURANCELIM > 0)
